text:
-4-
January 27 - Producer, director, writer, has packaged and produced
over 200 educational and public service TV programs, organized work-
ship for large university, teaches college-level. Wants administrative,
producer or program director position. Male, M.F.A., 35, single.
Location open. $6200.
January 28 - Associate director presently employed at third largest orig¬
ination point for CBS-TV, desires switch to ETV as program director or
production manager. Male, married, 25, B.A. Location open. $125/wk.
January 29 - Recent TV workshop graduate with B.S. in business admin¬
istration, wishes position in ETV as production assistant. Male, 25,
single. Location open. $70/wk.
January 30 - TV electronics engineer, instructor and technical writer,
over 13 years experience in electronics. Project engineer on 3 network
stations. Substantial experience teaching radio-TV. Male, 47, married,
B.S. Wants in metropolitan area of New York. $110/wk.
January 31 - Young woman college graduate in Communications seeks a
position on the production staff of an educational broadcasting station.
23, B.S., single. Location open. $2600.
January 32 - Male, single, 37, M.S. (Syracuse) with 10 years experience
as a professional entertainer and on the air experience as a producer-
director of educational programs, wants position as producer-director
with educational station. Location open. $5000.
January 33 - Male, married, 29, M.A. in Education, wants start in
educational broadcasting as production assistant. Desires Northeast
location. Salary open.
January 34 - Education graduate with some radio experience as an an¬
nouncer wants position as announcer or production assistant in ETV.
Male, 27, A.B., married. Location open. $4500.
January 35 - Executive producer of special films for a branch of U.S.
Army, 17 years experience writing, directing and producing films,
expert at pre-production planning. Wants position as film director
or producer-director in ETV. Male, married, 42. Location open but
prefers New York state. $10,000.
